name: EndScreen
description: Text used on the ending scene

EndScreen1TextLine4.text: Is that considered good or bad?

EndScreen1TextLine5.text: Let's go with: definitely bad. Sorry.

EndScreen1TextLine7.text: Press the start button to reset.

EndScreen2TextLine3.text: Maybe it was the fastest. Maybe not.

EndScreen2TextLine4.text: Figuring that out in 68k is hard.

EndScreen2TextLine5.text: So I took the fast path & didn't try.

EndScreen2TextLine7.text: Press the start button to reset.

EndScreen3TextLine3.text: Next you could try every map combo.

EndScreen3TextLine4.text: There's easily over a billion of them.

EndScreen3TextLine7.text: Press the start button to reset.

EndScreen4TextLine2.text: Hey, you found the shortest path.

EndScreen4TextLine3.text: There's only a 1/28 chance of that.

EndScreen4TextLine4.text: I didn't count the total steps though.

EndScreen4TextLine5.text: So maybe you could have been faster.

EndScreen4TextLine7.text: Press the start button to reset.
